pages.text: Added Draconic Evolution mod; $(br)Added Botany Pots Tiers mod;$(br)Added Item Collectors mod; $(br)Added Project EX mod; $(br)Replaced FastFurnace with FastFurnace Minus Replacement; $(br)Replaced Inventory Sorter and Inventory Essentials with Inventory Profiles Next;

Replaced Coloured Tooltips with Legendary Tooltips; $(br)Replaced Structures Compass with Explorers Compass; $(br)Removed ChocolateFix, because Forge has the same function; $(br)Removed KleeSlabs because Double Slabs has the same function;

Removed the recipes of Darkmatter & Redmatter Solar Panel; $(br)Added tags for Marble from Astral Sorcery & Quark, you can now convert them using chisels from Chisel mod; $(br)Unified (almost) all outputs with items from Emendatus Enigmatica.
